text: Ya hear me, woman? Ya mine - heart, mind, body n' soul! N' I'm gonna spend every moment I got reminding ya just how much Daddy worships da ground ya walk on. So git ta crackin' dem books - sooner ya smash da studies, sooner I kin reward all yor hard work properly n' pleasurably, ya feel me? flashes wicked grin Da future is ours, baby. An' it's gonna be lit AS FUCK! ğŸ˜ˆ
